job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtTitleampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspMachine Learning Engineer and PrototyperltpgtltpgtDurationampnbspampnbsp12 MonthsltpgtltpgtLocationampnbspampnbspampnbspTampa Washington DC  NYC Delaware Buffalo IrvingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtNeed to be able to commute to one of these Client locations as neededltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtDescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtMachine Learning Engineer and Prototyper We need engineers who are comfortable with preproduction work rather than working on existing systemsltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a machine learning engineer with a focus on rapid prototyping and preproduction development to build innovative solutions for the Productivity team The ML Engineer will become an integral part of the Productivity and D10X team Our teams work with businesses to solve hard problems that require experimentation an outside in perspective and experience navigating ambiguityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob BackgroundcontextltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe objective of the job is to create experiment and put in place rapid prototypes and initial MVPs where solution hypothesis generation and testing is done with tangible throwaway proofofconcepts and rapidly implemented solutions We expect that much of the work will require an application of machine learning aimed at process automation but will likely also involve elements of data engineering back end development and process  systems mapping and designltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtYou should be a jack of all trades with a wellrounded set of programming skills and data sciencedata engineering knowledge with experience in preproduction development You should have an interest in understanding why a software feature has business value  and want to know the customer journey that is being addressed to ensure you are building the right thing in the right way Versatility is key as every project will require a different approach sometimes including nontechnical work like process mapping or data gatheringltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis job will require a high degree of independence curiosity initiative and comfort with good enough over perfection It will also require a huge amount of extroverted communications with other parts of Citi If you have to be told what to do on a daily basis if you dont like sharing your work early or if you are not comfortable in developing relationships in a large organization then this job is not for youltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtKey ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtPrimarily youll be developing prototypes and initial MVPs for functions like risk finance compliance and HRltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTechnical Skillsltstronggtltpgtltpgt Rapid prototyping experienceltpgtltpgt Comfort with ML concepts and tools including Pythonltpgtltpgt Comfort with data manipulation and data engineeringltpgtltpgt Basic backend development skills PHP Javaltpgtltpgt Experience with APIs REST and micro servicesltpgtltpgt Experience with rational databasesltpgtltpgt Knowledge of code versioningltpgtltpgt Comfort with systems mapping and communicating about process and data flowsltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOther Considerationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt Technical degreeltpgtltpgt Basic frontend development skills HTML CSS JavaScript Angular Flutter React a plus but not requiredltpgtltpgt Experience with early stage new product developmentltpgtltpgt Excellent communication skillsltpgtltpgt Ability to work with minimal supervisionltpgtltpgt Willing to collaborate with teams in diverse locationsltpgtltpgt Problem solving skills demonstrated by past positionsltpgtltpgt Ability to work under tight deadlines and handle multiple tasks in changing environmentltpgtltpgt Experience working at fintech startups or corporate innovation teams is a plusltpgt
